mapper.select:
SELECT AllUsers.*, u.mypoint FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(b.score_change) IS NOT NULL THEN RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(b.score_change) DESC) ELSE NULL END AS ranking, a.usercode, a.nickname, a.profile_img, a.name, a.username, COALESCE(SUM(b.score_change), 0) AS Total_Km, COALESCE(d.crew_name, 'No Crew') AS crew_name FROM user_tbl a LEFT JOIN record_tbl b ON a.usercode = b.usercode LEFT JOIN crew_member_tbl c ON a.usercode = c.usercode LEFT JOIN create_crew_tbl d ON c.create_crew_code = d.create_crew_code
GROUP BY a.usercode, a.nickname, a.profile_img, d.crew_name, a.name, a.username ) AS AllUsers LEFT JOIN point_tbl u ON AllUsers.usercode = u.usercode WHERE AllUsers.usercode = (SELECT usercode FROM user_tbl WHERE username = #{param1});
mapper.update: update user_tbl set profile_img = #{param2} where username = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into deleted_user_tbl (usercode, username, password, nickname, addr, addr_details, zip_code, birthdate, gender, tel, profile_img, is_info_disclosure, role, is_google, creation_date, mypoint, point_code, point_change_code) select u.usercode, u.username, u.password, u.nickname, u.addr, u.addr_details, u.zip_code, u.birthdate, u.gender, u.tel, u.profile_img, u.is_info_disclosure, u.role, u.is_google, u.creation_date, p.mypoint, p.point_code, p.point_change_code from user_tbl u left join point_tbl p ON u.usercode = p.usercode where u.usercode=#{param1} ;
mapper.select: select o.*, m.marathon_name marathon_name from order_tbl o join marathon_list_tbl m on o.marathon_code = m.marathon_code where o.usercode = #{param1}
SELECT * FROM marathon_form_tbl WHERE usercode = #{param1} AND is_deleted = 0 limit 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO marathon_form_tbl (name, tel, addr, addr_details, gender, birth_date, size, terms_agreement, privacy_consent, media_consent, usercode) VALUES (#{name}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{addr_details}, #{gender}, #{birth_date}, #{size}, #{terms_agreement}, #{privacy_consent}, #{media_consent}, #{usercode})
mapper.select: select c.certificate_code as certificate_code, c.content as content, c.proof_photo as proof_photo, c.updated_date as updated_date, c.result_status as result_status, c.result_date as result_date from certificate_tbl c join order_tbl o on c.order_code = o.order_code join cart_tbl ct on o.cart_code = ct.cart_code join marathon_list_tbl m on ct.marathon_code = m.marathon_code join user_tbl u on c.username = u.username where c.username = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into certificate_tbl (content, proof_photo, result_status, order_code, username) values (#{content}, #{proof_photo}, '처리중', 1, #{username})
mapper.select: select * from qna_tbl where usercode=#{param1} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into qna_tbl (qna_code, qna_subject, qna_content, usercode) values(#{qna_code}, #{qna_subject}, #{qna_content}, #{usercode})
mapper.select: select q.*, a.answer_content answer_content from qna_tbl q left join answer_tbl a on q.qna_code = a.qna_code where q.qna_code=#{param1}
